column1: Little Goat Diner////There were so many vegetarian options
column2: I was really pleased. And breakfast all day! i felt like I had so many options to choose from. We got the veggie burger with mushroom toppings
column4: and choco taco sundae. The burger was tasty
column5: I loved the toppings. Probably one of the best I've ever had. We also loved the hashbrowns (the potatoes were in spaghetti like strips). And got some of their house habanero-apricot hot sauce--yum. The sundae was good
column6: but after trying the sour cream ice cream (almost had a cream cheese taste)
column7: it made me wish it was regular old vanilla ice cream. I must be so boring
